metadata.title: CVE-2019-11387 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in OWASP ModSecurity Core Rule Set (CRS) through3.1.0. /rules/REQUEST-942-APPLICATION-ATTACK-SQLI.conf allows remoteattackers to cause a denial of service (ReDOS) by entering a speciallycrafted string with nested repetition operators.

criterions.comment: modsecurity-crs: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
